AchievementMetadata.LockedDescription: In Mission 1, find and access Chief's record.
AchievementMetadata.Name: Digging up the Past
AchievementMetadata.UnlockedDescription: Found and accessed Chief's record in Mission 1.

AchievementMetadata.LockedDescription: In Mission 2. get significant air in the Warthog at midnight.
AchievementMetadata.Name: Midnight Launch
AchievementMetadata.UnlockedDescription: Got significant air in the Warthog at midnight in Mission 2.

AchievementMetadata.LockedDescription: In Mission 3, carry a UNSC weapon all the way through on Heroic or harder.
AchievementMetadata.Name: This is my Rifle, this is my Gun
AchievementMetadata.UnlockedDescription: Carried a UNSC weapon all the way through on Heroic or harder in Mission 3.

AchievementMetadata.LockedDescription: Make it through mission 4 without one preventable Marine death on Heroic or harder.
AchievementMetadata.Name: Bros to the Close
AchievementMetadata.UnlockedDescription: Made it through mission 4 without one preventable Marine death on Heroic or harder.

AchievementMetadata.LockedDescription: In Mission 5, hijack a Wraith and use it to kill at least four enemy Wraiths on Heroic or harder.
AchievementMetadata.Name: Mortardom
AchievementMetadata.UnlockedDescription: In Mission 5, hijacked a Wraith and used it to kill at least four enemy Wraiths on Heroic or harder.

AchievementMetadata.LockedDescription: In Mission 6, trick or force a Hunter to fall to his demise.
AchievementMetadata.Name: Explore the Floor
AchievementMetadata.UnlockedDescription: In Mission 6, tricked or forced a Hunter to fall to his demise.

AchievementMetadata.LockedDescription: In Mission 7, take out both Hunters using only the Sticky Detonator.
AchievementMetadata.Name: Give Him the Stick
AchievementMetadata.UnlockedDescription: In Mission 7, took out both Hunters using only the Sticky Detonator.

AchievementMetadata.LockedDescription: In mission 9, kill 3 Crawlers in one hit with the Gravity Hammer.
AchievementMetadata.Name: Whack a Mole
AchievementMetadata.UnlockedDescription: In mission 9, killed 3 Crawlers in one hit with the Gravity Hammer.
